com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.server

Interface ServerEndpoint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerEndpointImpl

    public interface ServerEndpoint
    Represents one instance of an Acrolinx Server.
    • For connecting and authenticating use connect(User).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ServerEndpoint NULL
      The NULL object for ServerEndpoint.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerConnection connect(User user)
      Connects to the Acrolinx Server without single sign on.
      ServerConnection connect(User user, SingleSignOnConfiguration singleSignOnConfiguration)
      Connects to the Acrolinx Server.
      AcrolinxClient getClient() 
      ClientProperties getClientProperties() 
      String getInstanceId() 
      ServerEndpointConfiguration getServerEndpointConfiguration() 
      ServerVersion getVersion()
      Returns the current server version (e.g.
      boolean isAlive() 

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final ServerEndpoint NULL
        The NULL object for ServerEndpoint.

    • Method Detail

      • getClient

        AcrolinxClient getClient()

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Returns:
        true, if the server is alive. Alive means it responds to the ping() method.

      • getClientProperties

        ClientProperties getClientProperties()
        Returns:
        The ClientProperties representing server-side feature switches for the clients.

      • getInstanceId

        String getInstanceId()
        Returns:
        a unique ID for the server, which is a string like this: 5c8cb5e3be90e997

      • getVersion

        ServerVersion getVersion()
        Returns the current server version (e.g. unknown if started from Eclipse).

      • connect

        ServerConnection connect(User user,
                       SingleSignOnConfiguration singleSignOnConfiguration)
        Connects to the Acrolinx Server.
        Parameters:
        user - The User for authentication. If the user was successfully authenticated by user name and password, in following communications the authentication token will be used.
        For creating a User use Users.
        singleSignOnConfiguration - The SingleSignOnConfiguration used for login. To create a SingleSignOnConfiguration use AcrolinxFactory.singleSignOnConfigurations().
        Returns:
        The established ServerConnection.

      • getServerEndpointConfiguration

        ServerEndpointConfiguration getServerEndpointConfiguration()
        Returns:
        The ServerEndpointConfiguration for the current ServerEndpoint.

      • connect

        ServerConnection connect(User user)
        Connects to the Acrolinx Server without single sign on.
        Parameters:
        user - The User for authentication. If the user was successfully authenticated by user name and password, in following communications the authentication token will be used.
        For creating a User use Users.
        Returns:
        The established ServerConnection.
